headline.main: GREEKS REPORT FOE FOILED AT KEY BASE; Tank and Infantry Assault on Yanina Repelled, Athens Says, but Rome Tells of Gain ALBANIAN CENTER BOMBED Planes Said to Have Damaged Airdromes and Set Fires-- Italians Claim 79 Towns

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, Saturday, Nov 2 (UP)-- Greece's defenders were said by the Athens radio last night to have struck heavy blows at the Italians on the fifth day of their invasion, with marching columns of troops and airdromes and other objectives in Albania bombed and disorganized.
